short_summary: The Contractor will provide construction services for the replacement of the sheathing of Wharf 402 at New Harbour in Guysborough County.
description: The Contractor will provide construction services for the replacement of the sheathing of Wharf 402 at New Harbour in Guysborough County, Nova Scotia. The work must be completed by March 31st, 2023.
full_summary:
## ITQ: New Harbour Sheathing Replacement
### A Nano-Contract Notice
### Procurement of Marine Construction Services
#### Notice Number and Amendment

 Notice Number: WS3725121043-Doc3726234860 (amended by Amendment 2)

#### Tender Closing and Competition Method

Tenders for the procurement of a Marine Construction Services under the solicitation number WS3725121043 are to be submitted by 14:00 AST on November 14th, 2022.

#### Work Scope
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) intends to award a contract for the replacement of the sheathing on Wharf 402, located in New Harbour, Guysborough County, Nova Scotia, with primary completion of all elements by March 31st, 2023.

#### Mandatory Requirements and Inclusive Goods and Services

All bids must be submitted with the required supporting documentation, by the aforementioned closing time. Failure to do so shall make the bid non-responsive.

#### Contact Information

For further details, please contactCarlos Castillo Nieto

Email: [carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Bid Qualification

Service categories and professional qualifications to be specified within the tender submission

#### Trade Agreements and CX

Applicable to all bidders
